readme:
_Learning something new? Endlessly searching to find the best resources?_ This workflow finds top community-recommended learning resources on any topic from Hacker News, delivered to your inbox.

### How it works

  * User submits a topic they want to learn via a simple form.
  * The workflow searches for relevant "Ask HN" posts on Hacker News and extracts top-level comments.
  * An LLM analyzes the comments and identifies the best learning resources.
  * A personalized email is sent to the user with a Markdown formatted list of top recommendations, categorized by resource type (e.g., book, course, article) and difficulty level.



### Set up steps

  * Add your [Google Gemini API credentials](https://n8n.io/integrations/n8n-nodes-base.googlepalm/). You'll need to create a project and enable the Generative Language API.
  * Add your [SMTP credentials](https://n8n.io/integrations/n8n-nodes-base.emailsend/#operations) for sending emails.
  * Customize the Form and email subject (optional)
  * Activate the workflow



### Screenshots for Workflow, Form and Email

![n8nworkflowscreenshot.jpg](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/n8nworkflowscreenshot_19197b6ea3.jpg)

* * *

**Built on Day-03 as part of the[#100DaysOfAgenticAi](https://github.com/ibrhdotme/100DaysOfAgenticAi/)**  
**Fork it, tweak it, have fun!**

readme_zh:
**正在学习新知识？苦于寻找最佳资源？**  
该工作流能从Hacker News社区为您挖掘任何主题的优质推荐学习资源，直接送达您的邮箱。

### 运作原理

  * 用户通过简易表单提交想学习的主题  
  * 系统自动检索Hacker News上相关"Ask HN"讨论帖并提取高赞评论  
  * 大语言模型分析评论并筛选最优学习资源  
  * 用户将收到结构化邮件：按资源类型（书籍/课程/文章等）和难度分级排版的Markdown推荐清单  

### 配置步骤

  * 添加[Google Gemini API凭证](https://n8n.io/integrations/n8n-nodes-base.googlepalm/)（需创建项目并启用Generative Language API）  
  * 配置[SMTP邮箱发送凭证](https://n8n.io/integrations/n8n-nodes-base.emailsend/#operations)  
  * 自定义表单及邮件主题（可选）  
  * 激活工作流  

### 工作流/表单/邮件效果截图  
![n8n工作流截图.jpg](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/n8nworkflowscreenshot_19197b6ea3.jpg)  

* * *  
**源自[#100DaysOfAgenticAi](https://github.com/ibrhdotme/100DaysOfAgenticAi/)第3日项目**  
**欢迎fork修改，尽情探索！**
